title: Pfizer Under The Spotlight And Feeling The Heat: Project Veritas Video Now At 27M Views!!!
cleaned_text:
Pfizer is feeling the heat from the latest Project Veritas video and their official response is contradictory and poses more questions than it answers.

Meanwhile the FDA has quietly changed the end date for Pfizer’s study of heart inflammation after use of their vaccine.

In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth covers Pfizer’s official response while also showing why they shouldn’t be trusted by anyone!

If you appreciate my efforts please consider making a contribution here:

Or you can send an e-transfer to dan@pressfortruth.ca

If you’re old fashioned like we are and prefer to keep it old school, we also accept cash, cheques, equipment and words of encouragement! You can send us those things here:
